column5: hey guys i was just wondering what the rule is on carrying alcohol across the border? i know you have to be 19 but how much is duty? how much can you bring per person without paying duty? we have nine thirsty guys going with us and i am trying to plan accordingly moneywise so we wont be short. thanks for the help nate
A case of beer OR a 1 liter bottle of liquor OR a liter and a half of wine per person is the limit.
